row.process: echo date=`date +%Y-%m-%d` echo time=`date +%H:%M:%S` echo date_utc=`date -u +%Y-%m-%d` echo time_utc=`date -u +%H:%M:%S` echo tz=`date +%Z` case `uname -s` in SunOS) echo timestamp=`/usr/bin/truss /usr/bin/date 2>&1 | /usr/bin/awk '/^time/ {print $NF}'` ;; *) echo timestamp=`date +%s` ;; esac :if &UC4RB_UNIX_FORMAT# <> "" echo custom=`date +"&UC4RB_UNIX_FORMAT#"` :endif :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process: :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*=*", "COL=DELIMITER", "DELIMITER=*=*") :process &hnd# : set &key# = get_process_line(&hnd#, 1) : set &val# = get_process_line(&hnd#, 2) : if &key# = "date" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_DATE# = &val# : endif : if &key# = "time" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_TIME# = &val# : endif : if &key# = "date_utc" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_DATE_UTC# = &val# : endif : if &key# = "time_utc" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_TIME_UTC# = &val# : endif : if &key# = "tz" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_TIMEZONE# = &val# : endif : if &key# = "timestamp" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_TIMESTAMP# = &val# : endif : if &key# = "custom" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_CUSTOM# = &val# : endif :endprocess
